snippet: The new National Opera Center in Midtown Manhattan will provide spaces that are many steps up from the basements where opera auditions and rehearsals have often been held.
abstract: Opera America, a service organization for opera companies, opens its National Opera Center in Manhattan with rooms for auditions, rehearsals and lessons.
lead_paragraph: The new National Opera Center in Midtown Manhattan will provide spaces that are many steps up from the basements where opera auditions and rehearsals have often been held.

headline.seo: National Opera Center, With Tryout Space, Is to Open
headline.main: A New Opera Center, for Practicing as Well as Performing
headline.print_headline: A New Opera Center, for Practicing as Well as Performing
